tiletitle.fieldDescription: A title to display as the headline for the tile.
tiletitle.name: ./tileTitle

learmore.fieldDescription: Load More Label for Mobile View
learmore.name: ./mainTextLoadMore

contextnavAlignment.fieldDescription: Choose Content Alignment for Context Navigation Tile.
contextnavAlignment.name: ./contextNavAlignment

leftinIpad.fieldDescription: Unselect for last tile alignment at center in Ipad view. Select for last odd tile to be left aligned in Ipad view.
leftinIpad.name: ./leftinIpad
leftinIpad.text: Incase of odd no. of tiles, align left

mainTitle.fieldDescription: Add Title for Context Navigation Tiles to appear in grid format.
mainTitle.name: ./mainContextTitle

linkwrttext.fieldDescription: Select for Button/Link to stick to the content.
linkwrttext.name: ./linkwrtText

swiperbehaviour.fieldDescription: Slider behavior to be infinite loop or finite loop.
swiperbehaviour.name: ./swiperbehaviour

textAboveSlider.fieldDescription: Text & Title to be added just above the Swiper
textAboveSlider.name: ./textAboveSlider

loadmore.fieldDescription: Load More Functionality for Mobile View
loadmore.name: ./contextNavLoadMore

controldisplaybehavior.fieldDescription: Icons for the left and right arrows.
controldisplaybehavior.name: ./controlDisplayBehavior

arrowAlignBottom.fieldDescription: Select for arrow icons to be aligned near the bottom.
arrowAlignBottom.name: ./arrowAlignBottom

mainTitle.fieldDescription: Add Title for Context Navigation Tiles to appear in grid format.
mainTitle.name: ./mainContextPackTitle

mediaCTAMainTitle.fieldDescription: Text that will appear for the main text Title.
mediaCTAMainTitle.name: ./mediaCTAMainTitle

mediaCTAMainDescription.fieldDescription: Text that will appear for the main text Description.
mediaCTAMainDescription.name: ./mediaCTAMainDescription

descriptionParagraphStyle.fieldDescription: Choose Paragraph style, By default "Paragraph 2" style will apply to description text
descriptionParagraphStyle.name: ./descParagraphStyle

nonactionboxdescription.fieldDescription: Text that will appear for the Non Action Box Description.
nonactionboxdescription.name: ./nonactionboxDesc

promoleftright.fieldDescription: Select for Promo in Left Right variation.
promoleftright.name: ./promoLeftRight

gridTitle.fieldDescription: Text that will appear for the Tile Title.
gridTitle.name: ./mainGridTitle

griddescription.fieldDescription: Text that will appear for the Grid View Tile Description.
griddescription.name: ./gridtileboxDesc

swipercheckbox.fieldDescription: When checked, tile container will have swiper view
swipercheckbox.name: ./swiperDisplayBehavior

techSupportDescription.fieldDescription: Text that will appear for the tech support Description.
techSupportDescription.name: ./techSupportDescription
